form-booking: A complete hotel booking and reservation form with date selection, room preferences, guest information, and special requests. Perfect for hotels, vacation rentals, event venues, and appointment scheduling.
form-contact: A professional contact form with customer satisfaction rating. Perfect for gathering customer inquiries, feedback, and testimonials with built-in validation and user-friendly design.
form-inspection: A professional inspection and audit form for field technicians and service professionals. Features pass/fail evaluations, photo uploads, detailed notes, and digital signatures for compliance and documentation.
form-quiz: A comprehensive educational quiz and exam platform with timed assessments, multiple question types, instant feedback, and scoring. Perfect for online courses, certification exams, and interactive learning experiences.
form-simple: A minimal form example with one input field and two action buttons - perfect for learning the basics.
form-survey: A comprehensive survey form for gathering customer feedback, market research, and user opinions. Features single-choice questions, multiple-choice selections, rating scales, and dropdown lists for detailed data collection.
